Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Navigation
  • public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Object
    Navigates the robot depending on given coordinates avoids obstacles and resumes navigation
    Author:
    Steven, Hassan, Aakarsh, David

      static int convertAngle​(double angle)
      Converts input angle to the total rotation of each wheel needed to rotate the robot by that angle.

      Orientates robot towards desired destination rotates forward to the coordinate avoids obstacle and resumes when avoided
      void travelTo​(double x, double y, double r)
      Orients robot towards desired destination rotates forward to the coordinate until it reaches the circle of radius r from the given point avoids obstacle and resumes when avoided.

      turns toward desired angle

        public void travelTo​(double x,
                     double y,
                     double r)

        y - y coordinate
        r - radius
